description:
Come stay in your own private flat in the best neighborhood in NYC. Park Slope is home to Prospect Park &  some of the most popular restaurants in Brooklyn. Just a short walk to the park, transportation (F,G & R subway lines), shops & restaurants. Enjoy the hammock in the private garden after a day of sightseeing.  

Street level entry leads to a floor-thru open-plan apartment with full kitchen. Host family is upstairs if you need anything, but your apartment is completely separate and private.

Our apartment is easily accessible via public transportation. Access to three subway lines are just a short walk from the apartment. (F, G and R trains) It's about 25 minutes on the subway to get to lower Manhattan. Public buses are just a couple of blocks away. There is street parking, but you need to be mindful of the street cleaning rules.
name: BK apt with garden! Holidays booking now!
review: A advisable place to stay in Brooklyn with a awesome host. It is a wonderful place to stay in Brooklyn with a lot of restaurants and small markets. The apartment is very quiet and great to relax after sightseeing. Jon is a awesome host and planing  a head to make your stay comfortable.
